personalInfo.name: Akshat Thakkar
personalInfo.title: Software Developer | ML & Data Analyst | Full Stack Developer

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A passionate and skilled software developer with expertise in machine learning, data analysis, and full-stack development.

faqs.question: What are my key skills?
faqs.answer: I'm proficient in Java, Python, SQL, C, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, FastAPI, MySQL, MongoDB, and various developer tools like Git, Google Colab, VS Code, Eclipse, Tableau, and Power BI.

faqs.question: What's my experience?
faqs.answer: I've worked as a Full Stack Developer Intern and Data Analyst Intern at Grownited Private Limited, where I developed web applications and performed data analysis using various tools and techniques.

faqs.question: What projects have I worked on?
faqs.answer: My projects include StateBuzz (FARM stack), Lok Sabha data analysis (Power BI), Fake News Detection (ML pipeline), E-Waste Facility Locator (ReactJS), and a CRUD application (Java, JSP, MySQL).

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.subtitle: My professional journey and the skills I've acquired along the way

description: Developed StateBuzz, a state-city-wise news portal using the FARM stack (FastAPI, ReactJS, MongoDB).
Built modules for auth, role-based dashboards, news posting, and comments.
Integrated Cloudinary for image uploads and added email alerts (signup, approval, reset).
Gained hands-on experience with REST APIs, React components, and FastAPI routing.
Analyzed Lok Sabha data (2004-2024) to study voting trends, turnout, and party performance.
Applied statistical methods and hypothesis testing for deeper insights.
Utilized Python (Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn) for data preprocessing and visual exploration.
Created interactive Power BI dashboards to present findings.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my technical skills and creative problem-solving abilities

items.title: StateBuzz
items.description: A state-city-wise news portal built using the FARM stack (FastAPI, ReactJS, MongoDB).

items.title: Lok Sabha Data Analysis
items.description: Analysis of Lok Sabha data (2004-2024) using Python and Power BI to study voting trends.

items.title: Fake News Detection
items.description: Machine learning pipeline for fake news detection using Python, scikit-learn, TF-IDF, and Gradio.

items.title: E-Waste Facility Locator
items.description: ReactJS application to help users find e-waste disposal facilities with Google Maps integration.

items.title: CRUD Application
items.description: Secure CRUD system for managing student records using Java, JSP, and MySQL.
